sentences: Scott David Shiflett (born August 22, 1966) is an American musician who has been the bassist in the punk rock band Face to Face since 1995.
Born in Santa Barbara, California, he is the brother of Foo Fighters lead guitarist Chris Shiflett.
Scott Shiflett joined Face to Face in 1995 replacing original bassist Matt Riddle.
Shiflett also performs with his brother Chris in Jackson United, and has filled in for Chris as lead guitarist in Me First and the Gimme Gimmes on several tours since 2004.
